text: Merilyn Phillips (born 19 March 1957) is a Caymanian former cyclist. She competed in the women's road race event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. She was the first woman to represent the Cayman Islands at the Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Caymanian female cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of the Cayman Islands Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Merilyn Phillips
